channel.title: Crystal bow
channel.description:
So guys my crystal bow is fully working with that arrow projectile to, but there is 1 problem... The projectile keeps shooting like a machinegun look in the pic:
[img]http://img505.imageshack.us/img505/790/cbowzl5.png[/img]
in the pic i shoot only a arrow and apeear 2 projectiles...
and a little question heh... how i edit the attacking delay ?

item.description:
@Epic_Codez wrote:

Try searching for the crystal bow item id and you might find something.
